name: Blue Brick
description:
We solve our customers development challenges, taking care of the software and management of the development process. 
 
We have a very wide spectrum of products we helped deliver so far: our recruitment software works in the biggest polish banks and telecoms, another product monitors water pollution in container ships; e-learning platforms we created reach thousands of students every month. We also worked on projects for the military and medical sectors and last but not least, we helped construct the largest Polish FPGA-based supercomputer.
 
Our technology and industry spectrum is very wide, and that’s what we love about our company. 

We’d also like to share our business experience and know how with you because we care about your company, not just the software we make.
